Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at The Residence Airport in Bangkok, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Suan Luang Rama IX Park and Paradise Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Seacon Square and Thai Nakarin Hospital.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 43 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax and unwind with body treatments and facials.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Residence Airport. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and a meeting room.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Residence Airport. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at The Residence Airport in Bangkok, you'll be near the airport and convenient to Suan Luang Rama IX Park and Paradise Park. This hotel is within close proximity of Seacon Square and Thai Nakarin Hospital.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Suan Luang Rama IX Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Paradise Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Seacon Square - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Thai Nakarin Hospital - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
CentralPlaza Bangna - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Sikarin Hospital - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Mega Bangna - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Bangkok International Trade and Exhibition Center - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Tesco Lotus Sukhumvit 50 - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Nine Center Rama 9 - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Samitivej Srinakarin Hospital - 8.1 km / 5.1 mi
Bangkok University - 9 km / 5.6 mi
The Paseo Mall - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Gateway Ekamai Mall - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Erawan Museum - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi

The preferred airport for The Residence Airport is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
